title: Why was my previous thread deleted.
body: Please explain why my thread was deleted.

replies.body:
Im not seeing any removals in your history.

Are you able to comment in it? Do you not see it under your profile? Is it under the “new” page on player behavior?
why didnt you remove this one? when its not a player behavior issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Jennifer17,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8bxYyiEQ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-12-30T21:31:19.739+0000)
>
> why didnt you remove this one? when its not a player behavior issue.

We try to address moderator issues where they crop up; it makes sense to post here if the issue occurred in PB.
It's not on the page. The only way I can see it is if I go to my history. Why?

Because the way you sort may not be prompting it. If you are using the general boards page to search, it probably got knocked to page 2.

Shows up on mine just fine. If it was deleted, you couldn't go to it.
you can also just go to the player behavior board and sort by newest

It's still there, it's even visible on the main Boards page, it's just that other people post their own threads and normally newest threads are at the top. Scroll down and you will see it on the main page, it's just 35 minutes old as of typing this up. It's not deleted.

This one's going to get deleted too, because it's not a player behavior issue.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation

> [{quoted}](name=GatekeeperTDS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8bxYyiEQ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-12-30T21:15:06.855+0000)
>
> This one's going to get deleted too, because it's not a player behavior issue.
> 
> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation

The thread they're talking about wasn't deleted; it just fell off the first page of Hot because it got a bunch of downvotes.
This one is still not a player behavior issue. :)
Almost everything gets downvoted and shoved off the next day in PB. I think that you just got downvoted to oblivion.
